thread.title: 911 call recording reveals Lamar Odom was on cocaine, herbal Viagra
thread.title_full: 911 call recording reveals Lamar Odom was on cocaine, herbal Viagra

title: 911 call recording reveals Lamar Odom was on cocaine, herbal Viagra
text: Lamar Odom Friday, 16 October 2015 (14 minutes ago) *Washington D.C., Oct. 15 (ANI): A 911 call dispatched from the people at the brothel in Nevada has revealed that Lamar Odom had white stuff coming out his mouth when he fell unconscious.* Washington D.C., Oct. 15 (ANI): A 911 call dispatched from the people at the brothel in Nevada has revealed that Lamar Odom had white stuff coming out his mouth when he fell unconscious. The Sheriff's office released the 911 call recordings from 2 different employees of the Love Ranch and both of them described a white pinkish substance coming out of his nose and mouth. One of the callers also told the 911 operator that Lamar was on cocaine two days before the incident and was taking heavy doses of the herbal Viagra , TMZ reports. County Sheriff Sharon Wehrly has said that they have taken blood from Odom in the hospital and it would now be tested for drugs. She said there was a possibility that Odom could be charged for drug possession. (ANI)
